channel.title: Donar items kept on death
channel.description: How do i make it so you keep an item without protect item... like a donator item so when they die they keep it. :O

item.title: Donar items kept on death
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

look for this code

} if(playerHasItem(6570)){ keep6570 = true; deleteItem(15150, 1); }
under it add

} if(playerHasItem(####)){ keep#### = true; deleteItem(####, 1); }
change the ####'s to your item id
next
scroll a little down
then u wil see
this

} if(playerHasItem(6570)){ keep6570 = true; deleteItem(6570, 1); }
right under that copy this

} if(playerHasItem(####)){ keep#### = true; deleteItem(####, 1); }
change the #### id to the id of your item

hope this helped.

Read full topic
